item.description:
Dear Innovators,

We wanted to give you advance notice of a special speaker for the June Meeting - Warren Tuttle, President of the United Inventors Association, will be speaking at our June 1, 2011 meeting!

Warren has worked behind the scenes on some very successful kitchenware products, such as the Smart Spin (8 million units sold) and the MISTO gourmet olive-oil sprayer (4 million units sold). As a marketing expert, he consults for large corporations, helping them become more innovative. He also speaks at national events, such as the International Home & Housewares Show - we are truly lucky to snag him for our meeting......please get the word out to your friends and associates! Remember, the public is now invited FREE to these open meetings.

We are also starting to record audio from our open meetings - and have started a Podcast series, which you can find on itunes at the following link:
http://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/innovation-invention-speakers/id433329307
or, on the web at:
http://hearth.com/podcast/irn/podcast.xml

In order to keep our members up to date with links, annoucements and other such news - we have started a facebook page at:
hhttp://www.facebook.com/pages/Holyoke-Massachusetts/Innovators-Resource-Network/210705578957971
http://tinyurl.com/67kd75w (shortened version)

Please "like" us on facebook - we need to get a certain amount of people who check in to reap the benefits. You can also add your own comments and links, so we can have a continual exchange of links and upcoming events.

 

Advance Notice of Next Public Meeting - Special Speaker, etc.
Please friend us on Facebook to stay up to date on links, happenings, etc.
Podcasts of Public Meetings now available
item.name: June Public Meeting with a special presentation from Warren Tuttle, UIA
